{{_formatTime(v + (j + 1) * _stepLabel)}}
{{_formatTime(_endTime + 1)}}

{{_formatTime(t + (j + 1) * _stepLabel)}}
{{res.name}}
{{_invalids[dayEvents.resource][slot.id][dayEvents.key].allDay ? '' : invalid.title || ''}}

<mbsc-scrollview-base [class]="'mbsc-scroller-wheel' + (s.scroll3d ? ' mbsc-scroller-wheel-3d' : '') + this._theme" #scrollview
      [batchSize3d]="_batchSize3d"
      [innerClass]="'mbsc-scroller-wheel-cont mbsc-scroller-wheel-cont-' + s.display +
        (s.scroll3d ? ' mbsc-scroller-wheel-cont-3d' : '') +
        (s.multiple ? ' mbsc-scroller-wheel-multi' : '') + _theme"
      [innerStyles]="_innerStyle"
      [items]="_items"
      [itemSize]="s.itemHeight"
      [itemNr]="_itemNr"
      [margin]="true"
      [maxIndex]="s.maxIndex"
      [minIndex]="s.minIndex"
      [offset]="s.wheel._offset"
      [onIndexChange]="_onIndexChange"
      [rtl]="s.rtl"
      [scroll3d]="s.scroll3d"
      [scrollBar]="!_touchUi"
      [selectedIndex]="s.selectedIndex"
      [snap]="true"
      [spaceAround]="s.wheel.spaceAround"
      [style.height.px]="_style.height"
      [visibleSize]="s.rows"
    >
      <mbsc-wheel-item *ngFor="let item of scrollview.visibleItems; trackBy: _getKey"
        [active]="_isActive(item, _getText(item.data), false)"
        [angle3d]="_angle3d"
        [data]="item.data"
        [disabled]="_isDisabled(item.data)"
        [height]="s.itemHeight"
        [is3d]="false"
        [isGroup]="item.data && item.data.isGroup"
        [index]="item.key"
        [itemTemplate]="s.itemTemplate"
        [multiple]="s.multiple"
        [offset]="scrollview._offset"
        [checkmark]="s.wheel.checkmark"
        [rows]="s.rows"
        [rtl]="s.rtl"
        [scroll3d]="s.scroll3d"
        [selected]="_isSelected(item)"
        [text]="_getText(item.data)"
        [theme]="s.theme"
        [onClick]="_onItemClick">
      </mbsc-wheel-item>
      <ng-container content-3d>
        <mbsc-wheel-item *ngFor="let item of scrollview.visible3dItems; trackBy: _getKey"
          [active]="_isActive(item, _getText(item.data), true)"
          [angle3d]="_angle3d"
          [data]="item.data"
          [disabled]="_isDisabled(item.data)"
          [height]="s.itemHeight"
          [is3d]="true"
          [isGroup]="item.data && item.data.isGroup"
          [index]="item.key"
          [itemTemplate]="s.itemTemplate"
          [multiple]="s.multiple"
          [offset]="scrollview._offset"
          [checkmark]="s.wheel.checkmark"
          [rows]="s.rows"
          [rtl]="s.rtl"
          [scroll3d]="s.scroll3d"
          [selected]="_isSelected(item)"
          [text]="_getText(item.data)"
          [theme]="s.theme"
          [onClick]="_onItemClick">
        </mbsc-wheel-item>
      </ng-container>
    </mbsc-scrollview-base>
